sn4.7:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn4.7:1.2: Atha kho bhagava bahudevarattim abbhokase cankamitva rattiya paccusasamayam pade pakkhaletva viharam pavisitva
sn4.7:1.3: dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva.
sn4.7:1.4: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
